title: Poor service
text:
Wondering if site scams. I haven‚Äôt been able to upload a bank
Acct number to receive any funds due me.

title: Shipping Price increase
text: Honestly vinted used to be one of the better apps but it seems like they‚Äôre upping the prices too. Shipping is significantly more expensive now and it discourages buyers from buying. It‚Äôs extremely hard to sell items now without having to decrease the price of the item itself.

title: Bag judgement
text: They use AI to judge my listings and thought that my listing was incorrectly labeled. Problem is that clothing falls in multiple catalogues, yet their robot dings you if you describe it too much. More words = more trackings. Best to upload as ‚ÄúPants‚Äù or ‚ÄúTop‚Äù. Lack of customer service and poor robots ruling the postings. Simple app to use.

title: Worst in the swap meet
text: I don‚Äôt know where people seem to think they‚Äôre going to get a $200 pair of shoes for 10 bucks. I put a lot of high-end stuff on this app and I ended up getting a lot of children offering me pennies to the dollar for the stuff. You‚Äôre better off waiting until the app develops more when people with actual money get on here to buy stuff.

title: Banned
text: I was banned after 24 hours because I hadn‚Äôt checked the app and they had asked for proof of purchase.. I tried submitting the information once I checked the app/ my email, but there‚Äôs no way to contact because I‚Äôm banned. I‚Äôm really a sad. I loved this app.

title: Fix the payment
text: Extremely annoying that it won‚Äôt except any of my credit cards as payment because they‚Äôre not issued in the current country where I live. It also will not allow me to change the address to match my credit card. Really stupid. Also the FAQ says you can use PayPal but I don‚Äôt have that option. why???

title: Thank you I love it
text: Thank you i love it so much great communication fast shipping and product is described just as you did it‚Äôs even better actually thank you so much ps I love my free goodies

title: Just allow us to sell what we want‚Ä¶
text: as long as you own it. This commercial item message is ridiculous. Support small businesses, especially during a pandemic. Help a single mother help pay for daycare. Help someone looking to help pay for their medication. Generate extra income so that you can take a break from your fast pace job, mental health. Do better Vinted!

title: Great prices :)
text: I love the brands they have for a price that‚Äôs a steal!! Love my Sailor Mars shoes for my cosplay and a cute top from Rue 21 for a very great deal! Don‚Äôt have to spend a lot to get a high end brand for a great affordable price ! That‚Äôs why I love Vinted !!

title: Terrible waste of time
text: I‚Äôve literally had Vinted since 2014. I had so many listings up there and now they just deleted all of them and when I tried to login they made me a brand new account and all my listings are gone. Never again going to put in all the time and energy that I did to upload so many listings throughout the years unfortunately.

title: Perfect transaction!!
text: Great communication and quick response. I had some issues with my part of the transaction but she was patient and found the way to make it work. And the shoes are perfect, as described!

text: I just received the shoes. They are better than I expected.  They are super clean and in perfect condition. I will buy more from this person. I highly recommend her ü§ó

title: The ONLY way to buy clothes!
text: Who wants to pay retail when you can buy/sell gently used items from someone else‚Äôs closet for so much less $!? Seriously LOVE this app!

title: New Balance
text: Excellent!! Exactly what I thought I was buying. Would definitely recommend this seller! Thank you again

title: Adorable cross bracelet!
text: I loved my adorable cross bracelet. It stole my heart. It came in today in the mail. It was on my porch when I came home I was excited to open the box. Thank you so much.

title: Depop or poshmark is better
text: I bought a sweater that came with a huge hole in it. I messages the seller about it and and we agreed to a return although she was a little hostile about it. The thing that made me angry was that not shipping was insanely expensive and i had to pay for the return label. Depop and poshmark both provide you with a return label for free.

title: Happy customer
text: Item came in exactly as promised. Extremely well packaged with fast shipping. Very content with everything. Thank you!!!

title: Kate Spade bag
text: Oh my gosh! So pleased! It‚Äôs absolutely beautiful! My daughter and I went to find a purse recently. Decided to wait and try the Vinted site she introduced me to. So happy that I waited!  The purse is beautiful! Excellent condition! I absolutely love it!‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Unable To Purchase
text: Has a great variety of clothes for great prices, but wont even let me make a purchase. The app says my card (a mastercard) is not authorized, but there are no issues with my card whatsoever. I cannot even use another form of payment because the app doesn't allow paypal, and apparently doesn't accept mastercards when it says it does??

title: Order
text: Everything was exactly what I was expecting! Came so fast after purchase!

title: Horrible
text: I had an account that I have had for years. After the update it blocked my account for ‚Äúfinancial issues‚Äù with no explanation as to why. I have emailed customer service and haven‚Äôt gotten a reply. My card I used was good and in date with money on it. I used to love this app, but now it‚Äôs horrible!

title: I‚Äôm a fan
text: Vinted feels like you local market swap place but with better clothes. The prices are very reasonable and the app seems to be user friendly. <3

title: Perfect!!
text: Thanks so much for these. They are super cute & look professionally wrapped. Quick shipping as well. They‚Äôll be perfect for my granddaughter. Very pleased. Highly recommend this seller. Thank you :)

title: Great person to buy from
text: Communication was great! Seller was happy to answer all my questions. A really good first experience on buying from Vinted. Thank You so much

title: My experience
text: They used to be the absolute best second hand shopping but then they took away the popular feed and it ended up in a dry experience with the app but otherwise great app!

title: Great Seller
text: She went above and beyond to resolve a technical issue with the shipping label. Clothes were better than expected, packed well and received quickly!

title: Everything so Cute!
text: I love my earrings I love my dish towel everything is so cute! got my order super quick I would order from you again!

title: Blocked me from selling after a week
text: So i had posted a few items on my profile which had no followers and i also wasn‚Äôt following anyone. I logged in after a weekend and told me i was blocked from doing so for ‚ÄúSuspicious financial activity‚Äù ‚Ä¶. i not once made a sale of any kind and was told they could help from the support team

title: Beautiful coat
text: Wonderful seller, super friendly, and great purchase. Highly recommend and would buy from again.

title: Warning DO NOT USE THIS APP
text: Do not sell on this app, I sold a pair of shoes for $200+ I‚Äôm a 50+ 5 star seller all 5 stars, a person with 0 buying or selling record bought my shoes, I sent them out they were DELIVERED, and they just told the app someone stole their package from the porch, they just gave him the money back just like that and canceled the order like nothing happened this is a Scammer app ran by imbeciles

title: Quick service!
text: All good, item as described and quick service. Stayed on top of the order.

title: BEWARE!! üôÖüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôÖüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôÖüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
text:
Never ever use this app. The company is super shady. I bought an item that was marked ‚Äúnew‚Äù but clearly the seller had lied. The item was damaged and not at all ‚Äúnew‚Äù. When I asked for a refund, it‚Äôs Vinted‚Äôs policy to have the BUYER PAY FOR RETURNS EVEN WHEN THEY ARE THE VICTIM OF FALSE ADVERTISING.  This means that if I were to return it I would literally lose money since the return will cost me more than the value of the item. Their customer service was AWFUL. 

Their ‚Äúbuyer protection‚Äù does nothing to protect the buyer. It‚Äôs just shipping insurance. üôÖüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôÖüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôÖüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

This platform is not to be trusted as they are supporting lying and protecting the perpetrators over the victims.

DO NOT TRUST VINTED!!

title: Customer support lacking
text: It‚Äôs a great concept but the app needs more work. The recent updates make it harder to track shipments or even upload tracking information. Customer service is pretty sub par.

title: Apt 9 purse
text:
This purse looks so much nicer in my hands than it was described. I love the two tone colors. I am very happy with the purchase I had made with this seller. Thank you
& have a nice evening.

title: Zero Star
text: If I could leave a zero star rate I would. Because it doesn‚Äôt even deserve the one star I had to put. Terrible app all around and I don‚Äôt recommend selling on it. I deleted my account because someone can list the same thing as me and it‚Äôs fine, but I post it same price and everything it‚Äôs deleted for breaking a rule. Do better Vinted.

title: Puma hoodie
text: I received it and am very pleased. It was very well packaged and delivery was fast. Would definitely buy from this person again

title: DONT
text: I was having a good time getting new close and messaging people about them after buying about three items 2 have been sent back for no reason and the other is still delivering while I was waiting. I went to check on vinted this morning to my account being blocked I don‚Äôt know what to do I spent about 40$ on Clothes

title: LV Neverful
text: Very pleased with the service I received answered every will a detail response ..My purse was in great condition I will definitely buy more wish I could give 10‚≠êÔ∏è

title: very bad shopping experience
text: My courier was picked up by someone else at the pick-up point.  The app limits me to confirm within 48h.  I was very busy at work during that time, so I didn't take the express delivery and didn't notice the information.  Vinted informed me that it was beyond the confirmation time and the money could not be refunded, they could do nothing.

title: Great shop
text: Quick responsive, quick shipping, everything is as expected and pretty packaging. Thank you!

title: Thank you so much!!!
text: I would give 10 stars if I could! Very very happy with the books and freebies. Amazing seller and great communication,fast shipping.

title: Logged out permanently
text: I have been forced out of my account for almost a month now thanks to a very buggy phone verification request. It does not work. I am mid sale and do not know what to do, support messages only link me to my inbox, which then I cannot access because it, again, asks me to log in with phone verification.

title: Grey Tee
text: A girl can never have too many great, versatile T-shirts in her closet, and this one is a keeper! I received it SO FAST with a nice thank you card and a little gift. I highly recommend this seller‚Äôs closet!

title: Fraternizing with scammers
text: This app allows scammers to create multiple accounts and there are plenty of them. I got scammed twice and got reimbursed once. Although I‚Äôve send them tens of messages they choose to communicate with you as they wish and when they wish. So I highly not recommend this app. Customer support is the worst I‚Äôve seen.

title: New Favorite Shirt
text: Couldn‚Äôt be more in love with this short. It was well taken care of, like new condition! The seller was a super quick communicator and shipper :) thank you!!

title: Happy with my purchase i love it!!
text: Thank you so much i love  the  bag it's beautiful‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è  i would definitely buy again from  this seller!

title: Quick shipping and excellent seller!
text: I absolutely love my dress! Got the item just two days after I ordered. Many thanks!

title: Excellent Service
text: Thank you for an excellent transaction and positive customer experience. Quick shipping and easy to work with!

title: Fast delivery & Item Matched Description
text: Everything was super easy and the item delivered quickly and as described in the listing. Love the jacket!

title: Awesome Seller
text: Love this seller. Worked a deal, fast shipping, product in great condition!  Would purchase again. Exchanged some conversation. Enjoyed marieayala763!  Pleasure doing business!
